text: Kailyn Lowry confirmed on Twitter on Tuesday, May 2, that Chris Lopez is the father of her unborn third child. After OK! Magazine tweeted a story with the headline “ Pregnant Kailyn Lowry takes DNA test — Is Chris Lopez REALLY the baby daddy? ” the Teen Mom 2 star, 25, replied, “ Ancestry DNA & yeah he is … stop with the headlines already. ” Find out more in the video above, and detailed below.
